attributes.action: Set A Suitable Minimum Wage For Workers 16 Years and Older
attributes.background: Many 16 years old I and older earn way under minimum wage while people around them earn minimum wage doing the same job as them.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you'd like the minimum wage to be the same for everyone, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/173945
